courseDescription:
Python is the technology of the future. In recent years, its use has exploded. Python is incredibly flexible and adaptable. It can be applied to AI (artificial intelligence) algorithms, task automation, data visualization, and complex calculations. It is also simple to learn, making it the ideal language for beginners. This course illustrates all aspects of Python, from its development and history to advanced functions. It starts by outlining the benefits of Python compared to other programming languages, such as C, C++ and Java.

You will discover the domains where it finds its applications and about the features of Python IDE (integrated development environment) as well as interactive and script modes. Variables, data types and operators will also be highlighted. Checking conditions, which are implemented using conditional statements, will be explained while functions will be described in detail. Working with sequences will also be covered and you will see how to use strings, lists and tuples.

Next, learn how to use sets in Python code. How to create, access, update and iterate through a dictionary will be explained. You will discover how to handle different types of files and text file operations. From there, you will learn about modules, packages, errors and exceptions while the final section covers searching and sorting concepts. So enrol now to discover how to use Python for real-world tasks!
